title: Luis Enrique - Wikipedia
snippet: Luis Enrique Martínez García (Spanish pronunciation: [lwis enˈrike maɾˈtineθ ɡaɾˈθia]; born 8 May 1970), known as Luis Enrique, is a Spanish football manager and former player. He is currently the head coach of Ligue 1 club Paris Saint-Germain. A versatile player with good technique, ...

title: SalsaBlvd | Luis Enrique | Biography
snippet: Best known for his "salsa romantica" style, Luis Enrique has had several gold and platinum albums, four Grammy nominations and many other awards such as ACE, Golden Globe, Lo Nuestro, Aplauso, and more, earning him the nickname "El Principe de La Salsa" (the prince of salsa).

title: Luis Enrique (singer) - Wikipedia
snippet: Luis Enrique Mejía López (born September 28, 1962) is a Nicaraguan-American singer-songwriter and musician. He is known as "El Príncipe de la Salsa" (The Prince of Salsa). A grammy-award-winning artist, he has released over 20 albums and achieved widespread success, including his single ...

title: Luis Enrique - Manager profile | Transfermarkt
snippet: This is the profile site of the manager Luis Enrique. The site lists all clubs he coached and all clubs he played for.

title: Luis Enrique - Player profile | Transfermarkt
snippet: Luis Enrique ➤ former footballer from Spain ➤ Right Midfield ➤ last club: FC Barcelona ➤ * 08/05/1970 in Gijón, Spain
